data: À plus de 40 ans, Steve Landry est un boxeur qui a perdu plus de combats qu’il n’en a gagnés. Avant de raccrocher les gants, il accepte une offre que beaucoup de boxeurs préfèrent refuser : devenir sparring partner d’un grand champion. (For more than forty years, Steve Landry is a boxer who has lost more fights than he's won. Before hanging up his gloves, he accepts an offer that many boxers prefer to refuse: to become the sparring partner of a great champion.)

À plus de 40 ans, Steve Landry est un boxeur qui a perdu plus de combats qu’il n’en a gagnés. Avant de raccrocher les gants, il accepte une offre que beaucoup de boxeurs préfèrent refuser : devenir sparring partner d’un grand champion.

For more than forty years, Steve Landry is a boxer who has lost more fights than he's won. Before hanging up his gloves, he accepts an offer that many boxers prefer to refuse: to become the sparring partner of a great champion.
